entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • OverloadResolutionPriorityAttribute seemed no respected #74067
  • NotNullIfNotNull or equivalent support for delegates #74066
  • ProjectChanged Events Triggered More Often #74058

Closed

  • EnforceCodeStyleInBuild reports suggestions as errors in 8.0.300 #73974
    17.12
  • Missing CS8602 for calculated property #74057
  • C# interactive window does not open after the last Visual Studio Community 2022 Update #74047
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-35019.05 #74061
  • Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Workspaces.MSBuild nuget package is missing reference to Microsoft.Extensions.Logging #72938
    17.11 P2
  • Auto formatting C# code with list assignments does not indent correctly #73541
  • Published package for the roslyn Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.LanguageServer feature #71474

PullRequests

Created

  • Persist the user's choice in ExtractClass and ExtractInterface. #74065
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Do not mark 2 first `int` parameters of an interpolated string handler constructor as unused #74064
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Fix typos in Roslyn-Overview.md #74059
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged

Merged

  • Fix APIScan authentication #74063
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Add LanguageServer.Protocol.Test.Utilities.csproj #74036
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Use separate feature IDs for ref struct interfaces and allows ref struct constraint. #74062
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - RefStructInterfaces, Next
  • Correctly define versions for runtime dependencies #74060
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.11 to main #74056
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next

Updated

  • Remove fallbacks1 #74041
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Add type hints for collection expressions #74051
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Simplify HostAnalysisScope storage #74055
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged
  • Add a cancellation on typing for SmartRename if user begins to type #73949
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Enable end-to-end binding and emit for basic scenarios involving instance extension members. #74012
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Roles
  • Ide options #74053
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Add fallback options to solution snapshot #74038
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Ensure an empty run result doesn't throw when generators are present. #74034
    Bug, Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators, untriaged
  • Use correct get / set inside ref safety analysis #73842
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
